channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Morning Show
channel.desc: Wake up to QVC! We've chosen products from across all our ranges to ensure there is something for everyone to enjoy. Tune in to see special guests too.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Morning Style with Katy
channel.desc: Join Katy and our trusted stylists and fashion experts as we help you create your perfect wardrobe, showing you how to bring key pieces and different looks together to showcase your personal style.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Cozee Home
channel.desc: Create a warm and cosy sanctuary in your home, with the Cozee Home range of snuggly bedding, throws and accessories offering comfort and coziness in your home.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Independent Living
channel.desc: Join us as we showcase products that help people with reduced mobility enjoy an active lifestyle. From mobility scooters to sound amplifiers, our range can help people improve their quality of life.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Lunchtime Show
channel.desc: Join us and our great panel of guests at lunchtime as they enjoy a chat and share a selection of fantastic products from top brands on QVC.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Marla Wynne Fashion Collection
channel.desc: Update your wardrobe for the new year with gorgeous Wynne Layers fashion from MarlaWynne, featuring layering pieces, scarves and more to help give every outfit the perfect finishing touch.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: JM Home by Julien Macdonald
channel.desc: Discover sophisticated home furnishings from designer Julien Macdonald's JM Home range, plus tips and advice from the man himself on creating an elegant and stylish home.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Beauty Loves with Aveda
channel.desc: Love your beauty? Tune in to see our exciting array of popular and iconic big brands, including Aveda. Plus, discover cult products that you are sure to love.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Ninja Cooking Appliances
channel.desc: From blending up ingredients to whipping up tasty meals, Ninja helps you prepare delicious, healthy food in your own kitchen. Showcasing their range of innovations, you won't want to miss this show.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Dune London Footwear
channel.desc: Starting on London's Oxford Street in 1992, Dune is an influential, dynamic and internationally-renowned footwear and accessories brand, with London heritage at the heart of what they do.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Helene Berman London
channel.desc: Update your wardrobe with classic, feminine fashion and accessories designs from Helene Berman.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Aveda
channel.desc: For more than two decades, Aveda has combined nature and science to create pure plant and flower-based products for your hair.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Beauty Loves with Aveda
channel.desc: Love your beauty? Tune in to see our exciting array of popular and iconic big brands, including Aveda. Plus, discover cult products that you are sure to love.
